item.title: Why dont dialouge work?
item.dc:creator: @JRealm JRealm
item.description:
@JRealm wrote:

Cause the Dialogues are declared in switch statements. (cases)

Example:

public class dialogueDemo {

dialogueDemo() { System.out.println("By JRealm."); }

private void dialogues(int i) {
switch(i) {

case 1://The Case. Created by switch statement you see above.
//The Stuff you want to be declared will be declared here.
break;//This ends the Case.
}} //2 Brackets cause the Switch statements has a {. same for the private method.

}//End of Class File

Read full topic
